entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
